S06n581:1: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-kva punarbhagavan śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate?
S06n581:4: evamanutpāde'nirodhe'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau |
S06n581:7: subhūtirāha-kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣaye śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām,
S06n581:8: evamanutpāde'nirodhe'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau nirvāṇe śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām?
S06n581:9: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-yatsubhūte evaṃ vadasi-kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣaye śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām |
S06n581:10: evamanutpāde'nirodhe'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau nirvāṇe śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyāmiti?
S06n581:11: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata iti prabhāvyate,
S06n581:17: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata iti prabhāvyate,
S06n581:18: api nu sā utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā jāyate vā bhavati vā vibhavati vā vivicyate vā rajyate vā virajyate vā ākāśībhavati vā dharmībhavati vā?
S06n581:20: bhagavānāha-takiṃ manyase subhūte yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata iti prabhāvyate,
S06n581:23: bhagavānāha-tasmāttarhi subhūte evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ na tathatā kṣīyate ityevaṃ śikṣate |
S06n581:24: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām |
S06n581:31: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśikṣāpāramitāmanuprāpsyati |
S06n581:32: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śakyo māreṇa vā māraparṣadā vā mārakāyikābhirvā devatābhirabhimarditum |
S06n581:34: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipraṃ bodhimaṇḍe niṣatsyati |
S06n581:35: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svake gocare carati |
S06n581:36: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate nāthakarakeṣu dharmeṣu,
S06n581:41: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate triparivartasya dvādaśākārasya dharmacakrasya pravartanāya |
S06n581:42: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadhātuṃ nonīkariṣyāmīti śikṣate |
S06n581:43: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatavaṃśasyānupacchedāya śikṣate |
S06n581:44: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'mṛtadhātudvāraṃ vivariṣyāmīti śikṣate |
S06n581:45: neyaṃ subhūte udārā śikṣā śakyā hīnasattvena śikṣitum |
S06n581:46: na hi alpasthāmnā śakyamasyāṃ śikṣāyāṃ śikṣitum |
S06n581:53: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na nirayeṣūpapadyate,
S06n581:62: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nāndho bhavati,
S06n581:84: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na prāṇātipātī bhavati,
S06n581:95: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣūpapadyate,
S06n581:100: asti hi tasyopāyakauśalyaṃ yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣūpapadyate |
S06n581:101: tatpunaḥ subhūte upāyakauśalyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya katamat?
S06n581:104: yathā anyenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānāni ca samāpadyate,
S06n581:106: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balapariśuddhiṃ nigacchati,
S06n581:110: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha-yadā bhagavan sarvadharmā evaṃ prakṛtipariśuddhāḥ,
S06n581:111: tatkatamasya bhagavan dharmasya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balapariśuddhiṃ nigacchati,
S06n581:118: evaṃ subhūte prakṛtipariśuddheṣu sarvadharmeṣu bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya yā asaṃsīdanatā anavalīnatā,
S06n581:120: evaṃ subhūte bālapṛthagjanā enān dharmānajānanto'paśyanto dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ na jānanti,
S06n581:122: teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyāyacchante,
S06n581:124: vayamevamapaśyakān sattvān paśyayiṣyāmaḥ ityatra śikṣāyāṃ śikṣante |
S06n581:125: atra śikṣāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā balānyanuprāpnuvanti,
S06n581:128: evaṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ cittacaritavispanditāni yathābhūtaṃ prajānanti |
S06n581:130: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte alpakāste mahāpṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīpradeśāḥ ye'pagatapāṣāṇāḥ,
S06n581:131: yatra suvarṇaṃ vā jātarūpaṃ vā rajataṃ votpadyate |
S06n581:134: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06n581:136: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06n581:138: punaraparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06n581:140: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06n581:142: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06n581:145: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06n581:147: punaraparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06n581:149: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06n581:151: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06n581:153: atha khalu bahutarakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06n581:155: punaraparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06n581:157: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06n581:159: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06n581:161: atha khalu bahutarakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06n581:163: tasmāttarhi subhūte alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06n581:167: tebhyo'pi subhūte alpatarakebhyastathatvāya pratipadyamānebhyo'lpatamāste ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyante |
S06n581:168: tebhyo'pi subhūte alpatamebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyamānebhyo'lpatamāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06n581:170: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ya ete'lpatamebhyo'lpatamā avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06n581:171: teṣu gaṇanāṃ gantukāmena ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S06n581:173: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya na khilasahagataṃ cittamutpadyate,
S06n581:181: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvāḥ pāramitā saṃgṛhītā bhavanti,
S06n581:185: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte satkāyadṛṣṭau dvāṣaṣṭidṛṣṭigatānyantargatāni bhavanti,
S06n581:186: evameva subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tasyāṃ sarvāḥ pāramitā antargatā bhavanti |
S06n581:187: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya jīvitendriye pravartamāne sarvāṇīndriyāṇyantargatāni bhavanti,
S06n581:188: evameva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya sarvakuśalā dharmā antargatā bhavanti |
S06n581:189: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya jīvitendriye niruddhe sarvāṇīndriyāṇi niruddhāni bhavanti,
S06n581:190: evameva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya ajñāne niruddhe sarve'kuśalā dharmā niruddhā bhavanti,
S06n581:191: sarvāśca tadanyāḥ pāramitā antargatāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti |
S06n581:192: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ parigrahītukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam |
S06n581:193: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmagratāyāṃ śikṣate |
S06n581:196: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yāvantastrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvāḥ sattvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhyamāṇāḥ,
S06n581:198: subhūtirāha-jāmbūdvīpakā eva tāvadbhagavan bahavaḥ sattvā bhavanti,
S06n581:199: kaḥ punarvādo ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ |
S06n581:200: bhagavānāha-yaḥ subhūte eko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhaṃstān sarvasattvān cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasukhopadhānaiścopatiṣṭhet,
S06n581:201: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvastatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati?
S06n581:204: bhagavānāha-ataḥ sa subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06n581:207: evaṃ mahārthikā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārikā |
S06n581:208: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena sarvasattvānāmanuttaratāṃ gantukāmena sarvasattvānāmanāthānāṃ nāthena bhavitukāmena buddhaviṣayamanuprāptukāmena buddhavṛṣabhitāmanugantukāmena buddhavikrīḍitaṃ vikrīḍitukāmena buddhasiṃhanādaṃ naditukāmena buddhasaṃpattimanuprāptukāmena trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau dharmasāṃkathyaṃ kartukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam |
S06n581:209: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ subhūte śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāhaṃ tāṃ saṃpattiṃ samanupaśyāmi,
S06n581:211: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarbhagavan śrāvakasaṃpattirapi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitā bhavati?
S06n581:212: bhagavānāha-śrāvakasaṃpattirapi subhūte tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitā bhavati |
S06n581:213: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakasaṃpatyāṃ sthāsyāmīti śikṣate,
S06n581:219: na ca prativahati-mayāpyete śrāvakaguṇā deśayitavyāḥ prakāśayitavyā iti śikṣate |
S06n581:220: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchati |
S06n581:221: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvāṃstato'nyān dakṣiṇīyān śrāvakapratisaṃyuktān pratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktāṃścābhibhavati,
S06n581:223: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na riñcati,
S06n581:225: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'parihāṇadharmā aparihāṇadharmeti veditavyaḥ |
S06n581:229: sacetpunarasyaivaṃ bhavati-iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā imāṃ sarvajñatāmāhariṣyati,
S06n581:232: atha tāmapi prajñāpāramitāṃ na saṃjānīte-iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā,
S06n581:234: evamapi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃjānīte,
